entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 10:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -14.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
